title: 820-3437-B Fan speed fast
message:
Hi,
This mac's fan speed fast all time, ASD shows critical smc error , any help please.

title: 820-3437-B Fan speed fast
message:
Post the exact/full text message of the error.
Also test disconnecting webcam.

title: 820-3437-B Fan speed fast
message: I would also inspect trackpad, trackpad flex, J4800, I/O flex and J9500 for corrosion.

title: 820-3437-B Fan speed fast
message: track pad cable was corroded replace it and solve the issue. Thanks.
